column2:
"It just so happens that Echo's running late. What
else is new, huh? While we're waiting, we might
as well get some practice time in."

"Client orders are a pretty big part
of what we do at ARKS, so you might as well
get used to them."

"This request is actually from me. It's not
all that hard. In fact, I bet it'll be a piece of
cake for the likes of you."
